title: ‘Gravel In the Tour de France is Nonsense’: Pogačar, Lefevere and Evenepoel Divided Over Rough Stuff Ahead of Key Stage
content:
Rough road sectors around Troyes on stage 9 set to shake up race and nervous Tour de France contenders. 'Anything can happen,' says Remco Evenepoel.

Read the full article at ‘Gravel In the Tour de France is Nonsense’: Pogačar, Lefevere and Evenepoel Divided Over Rough Stuff Ahead of Key Stage on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
